name: Flor de Barcelona
description: The flower panot, also called the Barcelona flower or the Barcelona rose, is a type of tile designed by Josep Puig i Cadafalch. Originally devised for the Amatller house, it was later used to pave numerous streets in Barcelona, ​​especially in the Ensanche. In Barcelona there are more than twenty different types of tiles, although only one has become a symbol of the city, the "panot de flor”, one of the most widespread and with the longest history.
